name: Ruin of the Reckless
description: Ruin of the Reckless is a breakneck-paced, melee-focused roguelike brawler with very light persistent progression elements and a punishing difficulty curve. Play with a friend!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 413 MB available space Additional Notes: RotR will run on most modern systems, but requires a monitor resolution of 1280x720 for the best experience.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Graphics: Monitor resolution of at least 1280x720 Additional Notes: RotR will run on most modern systems, but will require a monitor resolution of 1280x720 for the best experience. Monitor resolution of at least 1366x768 is recommended for co-op play.
